name: ollama-proxy
description: A proxy server for Ollama, implemented in TypeScript with Bun.
author: XiaoLinXiaoZhu

scripts.build-all: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 ./src/server.ts --outfile dist/ollama-proxy-linux-x64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64-baseline ./src/server.ts --outfile dist/ollama-proxy-linux-x64-baseline && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64-modern ./src/server.ts --outfile dist/ollama-proxy-linux-x64-modern && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 ./src/server.ts --outfile dist/ollama-proxy-linux-arm64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 ./src/server.ts --outfile dist/ollama-proxy-windows-x64.exe && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64-baseline ./src/server.ts --outfile dist/ollama-proxy-windows-x64-baseline.exe && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64-modern ./src/server.ts --outfile dist/ollama-proxy-windows-x64-modern.exe && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 ./src/server.ts --outfile dist/ollama-proxy-darwin-arm64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 ./src/server.ts --outfile dist/ollama-proxy-darwin-x64
